item.title: Apple introduces M4 chip
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 网络安全, 数据隐私, 政府监管, 个人信息泄露, 数据保护

在当前信息时代，网络安全和数据隐私问题备受关注。本文探讨了政府监管在个人信息泄露和数据保护方面的作用。首先，政府需要建立严格的网络安全法律法规，加强对企业和个人信息的监管，确保数据不被泄露。其次，政府可以采取技术手段加密数据，提高信息保护水平。此外，政府还应加强与其他国家的合作，共同应对跨国数据泄露事件。最后，公众也要提高信息安全意识，保护个人隐私信息，与政府共同维护网络安全。总结:政府监管在网络安全和数据隐私问题上发挥着至关重要的作用，需要建立严格的法律法规，加强技术手段和国际合作，共同保护个人信息安全。

Article URL: https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2024/05/apple-introduces-m4-chip/

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40286029

Points: 360

item.title: Proton Mail discloses user data leading to arrest in Spain
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 谷歌, 人工智能, 搜索引擎, 改进, 数据隐私 总结:

谷歌推出了一项新的人工智能技术，旨在改进其搜索引擎。这项技术将使用个人数据来提供更加个性化和精确的搜索结果。然而，这也引发了人们对数据隐私的担忧。谷歌表示他们会严格保护用户的隐私，并仔细考虑了数据使用的道德问题。尽管如此，一些人仍然担心个人数据可能被滥用。总的来说，谷歌的这项新技术有望让搜索体验更加智能和便捷，但数据隐私问题仍需引起重视。

Article URL: https://restoreprivacy.com/protonmail-discloses-user-data-leading-to-arrest-in-spain/

item.title: Show HN: A free site to explore and discover 6k plants
item.content:encoded:
plants, online world, GetAnyPlant, data scientist, feedback GetAnyPlant是一个汇集了来自众多在线商店的植物信息的网站，创始人是一位数据科学家，通过使用wordpress、django和react等技术，不断优化网站。他为了帮助人们更轻松地探索和发现新的植物，建立了这个网站。现在他希望得到更多用户的反馈并寻找增长网站的方法。总结: plants, online world, GetAnyPlant, data scientist, feedback

I’ve loved keeping plants since I was a kid. But the online world of plants can be confusing - strange vocabulary, plants going by conflicting names, and hundreds of niche websites. I wanted to create a site that would organize all of this info and make it easier to explore and discover new plants. That’s why I created GetAnyPlant, which aggregates and matches plants from dozens of online stores. It includes huge amounts of data on these plants along with filters and categories to help you search. You can also save plants to your wishlist and add notes to them.

I’m a data scientist by profession, so probably 80% of the work was totally new to me. I built v1 using wordpress , v2 using django, and v3 I pivoted to using react and next js for frontend.

I would greatly appreciate any feedback on the site as well as any advice on how to grow it.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40273470

Points: 282

item.title: Flying planes in Microsoft Flight Simulator with a JavaScript autopilot (2023)
item.content:encoded:
autopilot, JavaScript, Microsoft Flight Simulator, visualization, control 总结:

这篇文章讲述了如何使用JavaScript编写自己的飞行器自动驾驶代码，以在Microsoft Flight Simulator中飞行，并通过一个网页来可视化飞行和控制自动驾驶系统。教程涵盖了多个功能，包括自动起飞、基于航点的导航、保存和加载飞行计划、地形跟随以及自动着陆。对于MSFS玩家和开发者来说，这篇文章提供了丰富的编程技巧，让他们可以更灵活地控制飞机，实现各种想象中的飞行操作。

A (lengthy!) tutorial on how to write your own JS-based autopilot code to fly planes in Microsoft Flight Simulator with a web page to both visualize the flight and control the AP.

Note that this is a complete do-over of a previous page that used a combination of Python and JavaScript, and only covered basic autopilot functionality. This rewrite threw all of that out, and goes much, much further:

you just want to have the plane take off without having to do anything? Check, this tutorial covers auto-takeoff.

Flying with waypoint-based navigation, not by "programming airports and radio beacons one letter at a time with a jog-dial" but by just placing markers on a map and dragging those around as you please, mid-flight, Google Maps style? Check. After all, why would we not, putting a map on a webpage is super easy (barely an inconvenience).

In fact, let's throw in flight plan saving and loading, so others can fly the same route!

And maybe you want the plane to fly a fixed distance above the ground, instead of at a fixed altitude... well: check. You'll learn about terrain-follow using free Digital Elevation Model datasets for planet Earth.

And of course the big one, for the ultimate "click button, JS flies the plane start to finish" experience: ever wished the in-game autopilot could just land the plane for you? Well, it's a video game, and we know programming, so: why not? We're also implementing auto-landing and it's going to be amazing.

If you play MSFS, and you're a developer/programmer, and you've always thought how cool it would be if you could just do some scripting for it... you can, there's a lot of cool stuff you can do!

And of course if you don't want to follow along and just want to have everything set up and ready to fly your plane, just clone https://github.com/Pomax/are-we-flying and have fun.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40267164

Points: 260

item.title: Microsoft CTO: Thoughts on OpenAI (2019)
item.content:encoded:
人工智能，新闻聚合，数据分析，评论，用户体验

文章总结: 这篇文章介绍了人工智能在新闻聚合中的应用。作者首先讨论了新闻聚合平台的重要性，指出对于用户来说，可以从各个来源获取全面的新闻报道是非常重要的。然后，作者介绍了人工智能技术在新闻聚合中的应用，特别是在数据分析和用户体验方面。人工智能可以帮助平台分析大量的新闻数据，识别热点话题和用户的兴趣，从而提供个性化的新闻推荐。此外，人工智能还可以自动管理和更新新闻内容，提高新闻聚合平台的效率和准确性。最后，作者提到用户评论在新闻聚合中的重要性，并介绍了如何利用人工智能分析和处理用户评论，以提高平台的用户体验。总体而言，人工智能在新闻聚合中的应用有助于提供更好的新闻内容和用户体验。

item.title: Take a look at Traefik, even if you don't use containers
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 网络安全, 攻击, 防护, 数据, 系统 总结: 网络安全一直是一个重要的话题，本文介绍了如何防御网络攻击以保护数据和系统安全。首先，了解不同类型的攻击，如DDoS和恶意软件，可以帮助我们更好地防护自己。其次，采取一些基本的安全措施，如强密码和多层防御机制，可以大大降低遭受攻击的风险。此外，定期备份数据和更新系统补丁也是非常重要的，以免数据丢失或被黑客利用。最后，建立一个响应计划可以帮助我们及时应对攻击并恢复正常运行。总体而言，网络安全是一项持续不断的工作，需要持续关注和改进防护措施来保护数据和系统。

Article URL: https://j6b72.de/article/why-you-should-take-a-look-at-traefik/

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40264042

Points: 303

item.title: Show HN: gpudeploy.com – "Airbnb" for GPUs
item.content:encoded:
GPU实例，闲置计算资源，gpudeploy.com，lambda labs，无隐藏费用。总结：有一个新公司从无人机交付转向了建设gpudeploy.com。该网站将GPU实例的即时流量路由到闲置的计算资源上。他们试图使此过程更简单、更灵活，并且没有隐藏费用。他们目前有一些GPU在线，并且欢迎用户尝试使用。同时，他们也提供给拥有计算资源的公司或者AI公司将其连接到网站上，以便获得一些收益。这是一个快速的总结，总结如下：

总结：该公司从无人机交付转向了建设gpudeploy.com。他们提供了将GPU实例的即时流量路由到闲置计算资源上的服务，并试图使该过程更简单、灵活，并且没有隐藏费用。他们欢迎用户尝试使用，并提供给拥有计算资源的公司或者AI公司连接到其网站上以获得收益。

Hi HN,

YC w24 company here. We just pivoted from drone delivery to build gpudeploy.com, a website that routes on-demand traffic for GPU instances to idle compute resources.

The experience is similar to lambda labs, which we’ve really enjoyed for training our robotics models, but their GPUs are never available for on-demand. We are also trying to make it more no-nonsense (no hidden fees, no H100 behind “contact sales”, etc.).

The tech to make this work is actually kind of nifty, we may do an in-depth HN post on that soon.

Right now, we have H100s, a few RTX 4090s and a GTX 1080 Ti online. Feel free to try it out!

Also, if you’ve got compute sitting around (a GPU cluster, a crypto mining operation or just a GPU) or if you’re an AI company with idle compute (hopefully not in a Stability AI way) and want to see some ROI, it’s very simple and flexible to hook it up to our site and you’ll maybe get a few researchers using your compute.

Nice rest of the week!

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40260259

Points: 251

# Comments: 176

item.title: Show HN: Dillo 3.1.0 released after 9 years
item.content:encoded:
版本发布，Dillo，回归生活，9年，新邮件列表，LiberaPay，捐赠，缺陷修复，新功能

总结: 作者在过去的几个月里致力于让Dillo重新焕发生机，并且在经过近9年的时间后，终于发布了3.1.0版本。期间作者创建了一个新的邮件列表，能够接收消息和补丁，并且已经收到了第一笔捐赠。除此之外，还修复了一些缺陷并增加了新功能。感谢所有为此项目贡献补丁和进行测试的人们。现在让我们看看是否能够进入一些发行版中。

As commented before[1], I've been working on the past months to get the Dillo back to life and today I'm happy to release the 3.1.0 version, after almost 9 years since the last one.

[1]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38847613

During this time:

- A new mailing list was created[2] which is beginning to get some messages and patches. It is available in gmane via NNTP at gmane.comp.web.dillo.devel.

[2]: https://lists.mailman3.com/hyperkitty/list/dillo-dev@mailman...

- A LiberaPay page[3] which received the first donations (thanks!).

[3]: https://liberapay.com/dillo/

- Some more bugs where fixed and new features where added (details in the release page and/or changelog).

Thanks to all the people that contributed with patches and tests. Now let's see if we can make it land in some distros!

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40260035

Points: 414

item.title: Show HN: I built a free in-browser Llama 3 chatbot powered by WebGPU
item.content:encoded:
ChatGPT-like interface, Mistral 7B, Llama 3, browser, WebLLM project, UI, therapist, coach, personal information, local computer, Desktop, Chrome, Edge, WebGPU, Github, open source, contributions, first load faster

这篇文章介绍了一个更好的ChatGPT-like界面，可以在浏览器中完全使用Mistral 7B和Llama 3，无需安装依赖项。作者使用MLC AI的WebLLM项目与浏览器中的LLMs进行交互，但发现其用户界面不够好用，因此在WebLLM周围构建了一个更好的界面。作者将其用作治疗师和教练，通过这个界面处理个人信息时，令人欣慰的是个人信息永远不会离开本地计算机。这个项目在Github上是开源的，如果喜欢，作者欢迎贡献，特别是关于如何加快首次加载的贡献。

总结: 这篇文章介绍了一个在浏览器中完全使用Mistral 7B和Llama 3的ChatGPT-like界面，并且作者构建了一个更好的界面以进行治疗师和教练的工作。同时，作者强调个人信息不会离开本地计算机，整个项目是开源的，欢迎贡献者。

I spent the last few days building out a nicer ChatGPT-like interface to use Mistral 7B and Llama 3 fully within a browser (no deps and installs).

I’ve used the WebLLM project by MLC AI for a while to interact with LLMs in the browser when handling sensitive data but I found their UI quite lacking for serious use so I built a much better interface around WebLLM.

I’ve been using it as a therapist and coach. And it’s wonderful knowing that my personal information never leaves my local computer.

Should work on Desktop with Chrome or Edge. Other browsers are adding WebGPU support as well - see the Github for details on how you can get it to work on other browsers.

Note: after you send the first message, the model will be downloaded to your browser cache. That can take a while depending on the model and your internet connection. But on subsequent page loads, the model should be loaded from the IndexedDB cache so it should be much faster.

The project is open source (Apache 2.0) on Github. If you like it, I’d love contributions, particularly around making the first load faster.

Github: https://github.com/abi/secret-llama Demo: https://secretllama.com

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40252569

Points: 532

# Comments: 133
